tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE institutions (
  institution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  institution_name STRING,
  institution_type STRING,
  data_sharing_policy TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Course (
    course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(255),
    instructor VARCHAR(255),
    institution_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES Institution(institution_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Institution (institution_id INT PRIMARY KEY, institution_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, established_year INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Department (department_id INT PRIMARY KEY, department_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, head_of_department VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, institution_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES Institution (institution_id));

CREATE TABLE Student (student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, department_id INT NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES Department (department_id));

CREATE TABLE Course (course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, department_id INT NOT NULL, course_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES Department (department_id));

CREATE TABLE enrollment (
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id, course_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES student(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course(id)
);
